description: A report calls for work on developing implants and other technological improvements.
title: France to start research into 'enhanced soldiers'
title_page: France to start research into 'enhanced soldiers' - BBC News
maintext: In a speech last week she said France had no immediate plans to develop "invasive" technology for soldiers. "But we must face the facts," she added. "Not everyone shares our scruples and we must be prepared for whatever the future holds."
